label: English
description: Hello there! ğŸ‘‹ I'm your friendly Discord Bot, designed to assist you with expert knowledge and answers based on your uploaded documents. Whether you have technical queries, need insights on specific topics, or just want to explore new information, I'm here to help. Just upload your document, ask your question, and I'll do my best to provide you with a precise and informative response. Let's make learning and information gathering easy and fun!

To end the session just type /end
